A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I saw this movie at a Thursday late night showing.  It is just awful\, it is a lot of lame jokes\, a dull subplot\, a dumb premise\, and a horrible Mary Poppins impersonation.  

I have no idea how so many critics are giving this movie an unbelievably high rating of 91% from critics. 

It's a badly put together movie with hollow characters and no common sense.  I cringed more at bad jokes in this movie than any other in recent memory. 

Please\, only see a matinee and treat it like a kids movie (despite the violence).
